page.title: 04CARL GILES O.B.E.,CARTOONIST
page.content: GILES HAS BEEN CARTOONIST FOR THE DAILY AND SUNDAY EXPRESS SINCE 1943 AND THE "GILES ANNUAL" HAS BEEN PUBLISHED SINCE 1935.HE BEGAN WORKING IN SOHO FILMLAND AND WORKED FOR ALEXANDER KORDA AS ANIMATOR AND ROLAND DAVIES IN IPSWICH.HE MADE DOCUMENTARIES DURING THE WAR. HE HAS STRONG CONNECTIONS WITH THE R.N.L.I. AND HAS BEEN HONOURED BY THEM MANY TIMES. TODAY HE LIVES WITH HIS WIFE IN A COTTAGE SET IN A NARROW WINDING COUNTRY LANE.HE ENJOYS EXPENSIVE CARS. HIS HOME HAS A LARGE GARDEN. CARL,RONALD GILES WAS BORN WITHIN THE SOUND OF BOW BELLS AND IS A TRUE COCKNEY.
